prompt_base: realistic sculpture of an alien overlord, gleaming white bio-armor, crystalline purple gems, menacing red eyes, visible tail
feature_prompt: polished surface texture, high-gloss reflections, volumetric rim lighting, sharp focus on the gems, smooth organic texture on body
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, dull surface, matte skin, fleshy texture, human proportions, bulky, flat lighting
